title: Do I have to recompile (source build) to use pytorch when transfer to another machine?
body_html:
Currently, I am using a portable hard drive, bootin different machine at home/company to work, one with 96 0M and another with Titan Xp. The conda version pytorch works well on both machine but the source build one report RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (48) : no kernel image is available for execution on the device error, any idea about fixing the problem to make the source build one portable between different machines, I tried recompile and it works but would not like to compile for hours each time to get it work.

CUDA 10.0, cuDNN 7.3, Ubuntu 16.04, source code at v1.0rc1.

Thx!
